title: Interview: Ashleigh Moolman-Pasio Is Reigniting the Passion for Cycling
content:
Shoddy Dave checks in on the women's side of the sport, her role at her new team, e-racing, and her cycling hotel in this wide ranging interview.

Read the full article at Interview: Ashleigh Moolman-Pasio Is Reigniting the Passion for Cycling on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
